ai-thag16.1:1.2_0: that I used to be in the past.
ai-thag16.1:2.2_0: you look even calmer than before.
ai-thag16.1:3.2_0: for one without hope, village chief.
ai-thag16.1:3.4_0: by one whose fetters have ended.
ai-thag16.1:4.1_0: the attachment to rebirth has ended—
ai-thag16.1:4.2_0: and the truth is seen as it is,
ai-thag16.1:4.3_0: there is no fear of death;
ai-thag16.1:4.4_0: it’s like laying down a burden.
ai-thag16.1:5.1_0: I’ve lived the spiritual life well,
ai-thag16.1:5.2_0: and developed the path well, too.
ai-thag16.1:5.4_0: it’s like the passing of a disease.
ai-thag16.1:6.1_0: I’ve lived the spiritual life well,
ai-thag16.1:6.2_0: and developed the path well, too.
ai-thag16.1:6.3_0: I’ve seen that there’s nothing gratifying in existences,
ai-thag16.1:6.4_0: like someone who has tasted poison, then thrown it out.
ai-thag16.1:7.2_0: they’ve completed the task and are free of defilements.
ai-thag16.1:7.3_0: They are content at the end of life,
ai-thag16.1:8.2_0: without needing anything in the whole world,
ai-thag16.1:9.3_0: there is no Lord of all that:
ai-thag16.1:10.2_0: as it was taught by the Buddha.
ai-thag16.1:10.3_0: doesn’t grab on to any new life,
ai-thag16.1:10.4_0: like you wouldn’t grab a hot iron ball.
ai-thag16.1:11.1_0: It doesn’t occur to me, ‘I existed in the past’;
ai-thag16.1:12.3_0: and the bare process of conditions,
ai-thag16.1:13.1_0: The world is like grass and sticks:
ai-thag16.1:13.2_0: when this is seen with wisdom
ai-thag16.1:13.3_0: not finding anything to be mine,
ai-thag16.1:13.4_0: thinking ‘it isn’t mine’, one doesn’t grieve.
ai-thag16.1:14.1_0: I’m fed up with the body;
ai-thag16.1:14.3_0: This body will be broken up,
ai-thag16.1:15.3_0: I won’t be angry or attached
ai-thag16.1:16.3_0: the young men laid down their swords
ai-thag16.1:17.4_0: you can gain the sorrowless state.”
ai-thag16.1:18.1_0: “The knower of all, the seer of all:
ai-thag16.1:18.3_0: He is a Teacher of great compassion,
ai-thag16.1:19.1_0: Hence the Teaching of the Buddha is taught.
ai-thag16.1:19.2_0: that leads to the ending of defilements.
ai-thag16.1:19.4_0: you can gain the sorrowless state.”
ai-thag16.1:20.1_0: When the bandits heard the good words of the hermit,
ai-thag16.1:20.2_0: they laid down their swords and weapons.
ai-thag16.1:20.3_0: Some refrained from their former deeds,
ai-thag16.1:21.1_0: When they had gone forth in the teaching of the Holy One,
ai-thag16.1:21.2_0: those astute ones developed the awakening factors and the powers.
ai-thag16.1:21.3_0: They listen in minds, applying (the minds) to me.
ai-thag16.1:21.4_0: they realized the state of quenching, the unconditioned.
ai-thag16.1:21.5_0: the senior monk who is dedicated to wakefulness ...
